name: ComicBookCountdown
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Each day we work our way through the Top 10 upcoming new comic book releases that we feel you should add to your "buy piles" or pull lists. We'll cover 2-3 titles each day explaining why they'd be good pickups for you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
